channel.title: junos on overloaded bits
channel.description: Recent content in junos on overloaded bits

item.title: Junos CLI
item.description: Junos CLI tricks Show only certain prefix length routes The “match-prefix” command allows for regex filtering root@vsrx> show route protocol ospf match-prefix */32 inet.0: 42 destinations, 42 routes (42 active, 0 holddown, 0 hidden) + = Active Route, - = Last Active, * = Both 172.30.5.2/32 *[OSPF/10] 01:31:06, metric 1 > to 172.30.0.2 via ae0.0 172.30.5.3/32 *[OSPF/10] 01:31:06, metric 2 > to 172.30.0.2 via ae0.0 172.30.5.4/32 *[OSPF/10] 00:43:54, metric 3 > to 172.
